actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide survivors' annuities to certain employees' survivors not currently eligible for such annuities, and to provide for reductions in annuities otherwise due to persons likely to become such survivors and employers.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide survivors' annuities to certain spouses of deceased employees who did not have a contemporaneous connection with the railroad industry at the time of death.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide survivors' annuities to certain employees' survivors not currently eligible for such annuities, and to provide for reductions in annuities otherwise due to persons likely to become such survivors and employers.
